name: DEMIM Verifiable Credentials Revocation Registry
description:
Decentralized Member Identity Management (DEMIM)

A revocation registry for verifiable credentials (VCs) to track the validity status of digital identities created for the Decentralized Member Identity Management at the Automotive Solution Center for Simulation e.V.
authors: Automotive Solution Center for Simulation e.V. <'info@asc-s.de'>
